@NotSoSlummy you're welcome. My piercer gave me that tip, works brilliantly (you may need to do it once a day for a few days though)
@NotSoSlummy mixing sea salt with a little sterile water to make a paste, apply it, leave it an hour or two and wash off, really works.
@NotSoSlummy I understand. I've got 13 piercings and salt water is the best for cleaning in my experience. Hope it gets better soon.
@NotSoSlummy don't remove it. Need to keep piercing there for infection to get out. Bathe in salt water, it will heal (mine was the same)
